trans-unit.source: In this section you add two new users to your directory along with the new Sales group.
trans-unit.target: In this section you add two new users to your directory along with the new Sales group.

trans-unit.source: One of the users will be granted membership to the sales group.
trans-unit.target: One of the users will be granted membership to the sales group.

trans-unit.source: The other user will not be granted membership to the group.
trans-unit.target: The other user will not be granted membership to the group.

trans-unit.source: Create the users
trans-unit.target: Create the users

trans-unit.source: In the [Azure Management Portal] navigate to the directory that you previously configured for authentication when you completed the tutorial to add authentication to your app.
trans-unit.target: In the [Azure Management Portal] navigate to the directory that you previously configured for authentication when you completed the tutorial to add authentication to your app.

trans-unit.source: Click **Users** at the top of the page.
trans-unit.target: Click **Users** at the top of the page.

trans-unit.source: Then click the **Add User** button at the bottom.
trans-unit.target: Then click the **Add User** button at the bottom.

trans-unit.source: Complete the new user dialogs creating to create a user named **Bob**.
trans-unit.target: Complete the new user dialogs creating to create a user named **Bob**.

trans-unit.source: Note the temporary password for the user.
trans-unit.target: Note the temporary password for the user.

trans-unit.source: Create another user named **Dave**.
trans-unit.target: Create another user named **Dave**.

trans-unit.source: Note the temporary password for the user.
trans-unit.target: Note the temporary password for the user.

trans-unit.source: The new users should look similar to what is shown below.
trans-unit.target: The new users should look similar to what is shown below.

trans-unit.source: Create the Sales group
trans-unit.target: Create the Sales group

trans-unit.source: On the directory page, click **Groups** at the top of the page.
trans-unit.target: On the directory page, click **Groups** at the top of the page.

trans-unit.source: Then click the **Add Group** button at the bottom.
trans-unit.target: Then click the **Add Group** button at the bottom.

trans-unit.source: Enter **Sales** for the name of the group and press the complete button on the dialog to create the group.
trans-unit.target: Enter **Sales** for the name of the group and press the complete button on the dialog to create the group.

trans-unit.source: Add user membership to the Sales group.
trans-unit.target: Add user membership to the Sales group.

trans-unit.source: Click **Groups** at the top of the directory page.
trans-unit.target: Click **Groups** at the top of the directory page.

trans-unit.source: Then click the **Sales** group to go to the sales group page.
trans-unit.target: Then click the **Sales** group to go to the sales group page.

trans-unit.source: On the Sales group page, click **Add Members**.
trans-unit.target: On the Sales group page, click **Add Members**.

trans-unit.source: Add the user named **Bob** to the sales group.
trans-unit.target: Add the user named **Bob** to the sales group.

trans-unit.source: The user named **Dave** should not be a member of the group.
trans-unit.target: The user named **Dave** should not be a member of the group.

trans-unit.source: On the Sales group page, click **Properties**, then copy the **Object ID** for the sales group at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: On the Sales group page, click **Properties**, then copy the **Object ID** for the sales group at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: Navigate back to your mobile service configuration page and add the object id as an app setting named **AAD\_SALES\_GROUP\_ID**.
trans-unit.target: Navigate back to your mobile service configuration page and add the object id as an app setting named **AAD\_SALES\_GROUP\_ID**.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial uses group's object id as an app setting instead of looking up the id based on the group name.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial uses group's object id as an app setting instead of looking up the id based on the group name.

trans-unit.source: This is because the group name may change where the id stays the same.
trans-unit.target: This is because the group name may change where the id stays the same.
